Product Overview

Be bold and turn heads with our Combat Compression Tights. Make your movement
sleek and streamlined with these tights’ flattering fit. Designed with flat
lock stitching to enhance your body silhouette, you can count on HPE’s tights
for men to support you through your workout – whatever it may be. Sculpted for
performance, their FRESHFIT® fabric and moisture management UV system will
keep you fresh, healthy and performing for longer.
